EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Dallas Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Dallas/Fort Worth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/fortworth> Join data technology experts from Pivotal to get the latest perspective on how big data analytics and applications are transforming organizations across industries.
This event provides an opportunity to learn about new developments in the rapidly-changing world of big data and understand best practices in creating Internet of Things (IoT) applications.
Additionally, attendees will engage in hands-on data science and application development training using the market-leading Pivotal Big Data Suite.
Who Should Attend In addition to addressing industry trends in big data, the sessions and hands-on workshop cover topics of interest to developers, architects, data scientists and technical managers.
AGENDA
8:30 AM – 9:00 AM Check-In & Breakfast
9:00 AM – 10:15 AM The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise
10:15 AM – 10:30 AM Coffee Break
10:30 AM – 12:00 PM Internet of Things Demo and Architecture Overview
12:00 PM – 1:00 PM Lunch & Birds of a Feather Discussion
1:00 PM – 3:00 PM Hands-On Technical Workshop
Register <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/fortworth> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. THURSDAY
April 30, 2015
DFW Airport Marriott South
4151 Centreport Drive
Fort Worth, TX 76155 REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/fortworth>
